SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.connection

Interface Client

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface Client
This is the interface that handles all the communication methods, it will be implemented by the two classes that handles the connection with RMI and TCP

    • CreateGame

      void CreateGame(int nPlayers, String nickname)
      Method used to perform the game creation in the server
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - number of players for the game
      nickname - username of the player who creates a game

      Method that makes it possible for the player to join the game

      nickname - username of the player who joins the game

    • PlaceCard

      void PlaceCard(int choice, int i, int j, String face)
      Method that makes it possible for the player to place a card
      Parameters:
      choice - number of the chosen card
      i - the row selected
      j - the column selected
      face - card's side selected
